website_summaries.verdict: Dress them up, dress them down. These popular Vans have been around for decades. They lace higher than the Authentic Core Classics and Chukka Low.
pros: Wave design on the side adds a splash of style to these canvas upper, rubber waffle-tread outer sole shoes
Huge assortment of colors and patterns
Sizes for both men and women
cons: A few owners say the back of the heel rubs uncomfortably against their foot

customer_reviews.title: Fake pics
customer_reviews.text: Pictures of the shoes show leather material, and shoes are really canvas, so it is really confusing and I am not happy about the purchase, I want to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Diego A Zapata Naranjo

customer_reviews.title: Love Van's Look/Always add my own Insoles
customer_reviews.text: Finally bought my first pair of Van's, True White Old Skools. The only reason I never bought them before (I'm 50) was their lack of foot-bed/arch support. I really like them. They look good, if that changes I will edit my review.
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical of buying these shoes after reading many reviews of the shoes not being the actual Van’s brand but them actually being knock-offs. I went ahead and ordered them, and they are in fact the Van’s brand and fit perfectly, just like my other Van’s I own. The only thing is that I waited like a month for them to be delivered, since I’m assuming this is through a second or third party, but other than that I’m so happy I finally own a pair of the classic old school low-top Van’s!
customer_reviews.author: ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Imposters.
customer_reviews.text: Ive own a couple pairs of these shoes and this is the first pair I purchased online. Never again! I wore them for an hour and had blisters on my heels. The insides dont had the black padding for comfort. I'll stick to buying at stores so I can see the actual show and what I'm getting. Theae are junk.
customer_reviews.author: TLP

customer_reviews.title: Item as described.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wanted this shoe. He reports no problems and intends to purchase another pair. The fit is good the product looks nice and it arrived several days before promised.
customer_reviews.author: Zanne63

customer_reviews.title: Received used item that does not fit to size specified.  Item dirty and obviously no new.
customer_reviews.text: This item was obviously used: the white upper sole of shoe had black streaks, box had box cutter cuts inside paper all wrinkled. Size completely unexpectedly too small...I have another pair of vans that are 7.5 and these 8 fit way tighter squish foot on top and way too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Probably fake
customer_reviews.text: Unless vans changed their shoe product, these seem fake.. no vans logo on tongue, different material, different stitching, inside is different from what it use to be. Looks like vans...
customer_reviews.author: Jaminson K. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Remember to order 1 Size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: Remember order 1 sizes small not 1/2. So I usually wear sizes 7 but I thought that 61/2 will fit me. Nop I try it and my toes and fonts cap can fits two finger. This is way too large. Others then that quality and comfortable are unbeatable. Nice looking design right now I'm thinking about ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Khualsim

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes! I am a big Vans fan so it was great to get these a little discounted with all the great feel of Vans.
customer_reviews.author: M&B

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: I paid more to order from Amazon than I would have at the show store but quarantine life. I still love these either way.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Vans
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoe! Exactly what I was looking for. Sturdy quality, very comfy! Classic vans, you can’t go wrong with these. I got the 8 and it is true to size! I’ll be wearing these often!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Nash

customer_reviews.title: It is not women's! It goes off men's size!
customer_reviews.text: This item may say women's but it is not! It's actually men's! Because I ordered a size 9 assuming it was women's size cause thats what it clearly says.. but when I received my shoes they were size 9 in men's!! And 10.5 in women's. Was very upset. Runnied a matching couples thing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hidrogo

customer_reviews.title: Classic Vans
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and he has had no complaints! They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Shyann Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Simple pair of Vans that's a classic. Fits as expected (usually order size 10, size 10 fits fine). Shoe arrived clean and fits just like any store-bought Vans.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Auh

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price is excellent
customer_reviews.text: great shoe, the real deal vans and my grandson absolutely loves them. I've ordered several pairs
customer_reviews.author: ALTHEA

customer_reviews.title: Great Style - Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the Vans Old School shoes but, after wearing for a day, I was reminded that they aren't he most comfortable shoes in the world. Classic look and feel but not very comfortable and wouldn't want to wear them all day and probably not more than half a day.
customer_reviews.author: RXC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice throwback to my now teenage daughter sporting an iconic era piece of footwear.
customer_reviews.author: average.joe

customer_reviews.title: Super cool retro style sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Vans fit very snug and secure. Will not slip off while skateboarding
customer_reviews.author: Guy Teribery

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are very comfortable and stylish and have now become my favorite tennis shoe. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Steele

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: 100% cheap knock offs. The bottom rubber wears significantly after few uses, the sole padding is cheap and thin as paper, the Vans logo on the heel will rub away immediately. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle_S

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know about others issues with these shoes,but mine are awesome.perfect fit,great price and really cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: james mayo

customer_reviews.title: These are in mens sizes
customer_reviews.text: This was really irritating to receive a men's size when the product clearly says "Vans Women's Old Skool(tm) Core Classics" key word there is women's. Vans needs to just say unisex in the product listing and make it very clear that you need to order it in a mens size.
customer_reviews.author: Emeline Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe that matches with everything
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe that matches with everything, great quality, and fairly comfortable. Only problem is that it'a a little hard to actually put on because it's quite a tight-fitting shoe. I also got them way overpriced, but I was unaware until afterwards. Overall though, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dakhlallah

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe just had to return because I ordered a size too big. Smooth and fast return and refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fits amazing, I definitely had some blisters for awhile because the leather on the back of the shoe but they're really nice and so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia Queen

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the sizing would be off, but they got just right.
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: They make me feet look small!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly! They are comfortable and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. White is hard to keep, so I had to buy another pair after 2 years so I could keep the fresh look. Otherwise, the first pair has held up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Deb T.

customer_reviews.title: Bad stuff. Disgusting..
customer_reviews.text: Run too small. Bad quality ..it’s look like fake. not worth 80 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Wu

customer_reviews.title: GREAT company
customer_reviews.text: cannot beat Vans Old Skool- I bought the wrong ones- they were awesome- returned full refund- But this review is on the shoe- lol again - once can't beat Vans!!! the coolest cats on the feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, very comfortable walking shoe, and the style fits basically everything.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Abadi

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my friend and he absolutely loved them! You save a little and you get ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend and he absolutely loved them! You save a little and you get free shipping! The box came in slightly dented but it didn't matter!
customer_reviews.author: Lili Jullien

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes do not have enough cushion. You can easily feel pebbles as walking on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky, terribly squeaky.
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes but they squeak with every single step I take. Very disappointing for a rather expensive tennis shoe. I can't even wear these they squeak so much.
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fake! When I revived them I took them to the store to exchange for a bigger size and the owner of the store told me they were completely fake! Save your money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Old Skool!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes a super cute, and look good with just about anything. As for walking all day them like maybe Disney I wouldn't recommend it, your feet will be killing you before the day is over!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. They are a little to high cut for me but putting pad in them helped raise my foot up.
customer_reviews.author: L. F. L.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, theyre a little hard to get over the heel though
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, love them so much but theres one problem, if you want a pair, consider getting half a size larger than your size. They can really hurt if you order your normal size. Im a size 10, and these still manage to hug my feet a little too tight. Overall good shoes, just unhappy with the size i got them in
customer_reviews.author: manuel melendez

customer_reviews.title: Great for Boys or girls!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Bought for my daughter with a hard to fit tall girl . Unisex perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Nelson

customer_reviews.title: They love them and they provide more support that Converse
customer_reviews.text: My husband and daughter have these shoes and they fit as expected. They love them and they provide more support that Converse. We have already reordered multiple times!
customer_reviews.author: Tina1219

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite pair of shoes. I wanted to give this style of vans a try so I went with these and they were perfect. Very good fit, cute, and comfortable as well
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe Magana

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes and very good quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these!! Cool shoes and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tbone47

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, I love them, i use them almost everyday!! recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Espinal

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Half size down. I'm normally 6, but I orders 5.5 and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Paulyn Vallejo

customer_reviews.title: Our grand daughter wanted these Vans and she just loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Our grand daughter wanted these Vans and she just loves the color and style. Looks more "dressy" that other Vans
customer_reviews.author: Cylynnie

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that this might have been a counterfeit product however I was pleasantly surprised to find that it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: meekii

customer_reviews.title: Great casual shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 16 year old son. He absolutely loves them. They have been great for school and casual wear. Would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: One of my son's favorite sneakers. This is not his first pair
customer_reviews.text: One of my son's favorite sneakers. This is not his first pair, nor will it be his last. The price was just right on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Hatter

customer_reviews.title: They fit as expected and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much and I am excited to wear them with skinny jeans and oversized sweat shirts this fall. They fit perfectly and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Bleeker

customer_reviews.title: I still like my shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not as wide in the toe box as I had assumed they would be. However, I still like my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rollerderby Lover

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected. It got 4 stars because it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. It got 4 stars because it's a hard shoe to put on. I had to order a show horn to slide in easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rxvel

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason these shoes have been so popular for ...
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason these shoes have been so popular for so long. This was my 3rd or 4th pair and the quality never fails. Just a classic look.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These still hurt my heels but they fit and everything
customer_reviews.author: TMoma

customer_reviews.title: AYYYY READ THIS
customer_reviews.text: bro these shoes be good asf they gave me so many fire fits imma have to order more bc the ones i got now dirty bro, ya hurd slime dog homie
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son is on pair four. He loves the comfort of this shoe. Oddly enough he needs a shoe horn to put them on but once on they are like a comfy glove. Sadly it looks like they are phasing out and the black and white ones are rare to find which are the only ones he'll wear.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Giardino

customer_reviews.title: Basic canvas shoe but not comfortable, hard to put on and take off compared ...
customer_reviews.text: Basic canvas shoe but not comfortable, hard to put on and take off compared to other sneakers. Back / heel of the shoe seems short and weak.
customer_reviews.author: scott noble

customer_reviews.title: ORDERED 9.5 WOMENS GOT 9.5 MENS
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 9.5 womens. i got 9.5 mens. like what???? im going to return these asap
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Return Policy
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was smaller than we expected for the size. We were able to return the shoes and get larger ones with no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: love them. Adding arch supports is a must for ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these shoes for my entire life, love them. Adding arch supports is a must for better comfort and to save your knees from long-term damage (if this is your daily driver).
customer_reviews.author: Theron Benson

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT, AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT, AMAZING, FIT AS EXPECTED!! AND FAST DELIVERY!! THANK YOU VERY MUCH I REALLY APPRECIATE YOUR WORK. I WILL COMEBACK SOON TO BUY FROM YOUR STORE!!
customer_reviews.author: HAMZA

customer_reviews.title: Good, well-made shoes
customer_reviews.text: Overall, they’re very solid construction. Just what I expected from a well-known shoe company.
customer_reviews.author: M. Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They fit like normal Vans do if you’ve had a pair before, they’re very comfortable :)
customer_reviews.author: Maria Orellana

customer_reviews.title: Vans is the best
customer_reviews.text: Classic and old school, basically the best skate shoe ever. What else can I write?
customer_reviews.author: Casey H.

customer_reviews.title: They have a chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: They had something on the sole, and were missing a shoelaces. They also smelled of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Classics
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes as always! Cant go wrong with Vans Old Skool- This style has stood the test o time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!! I wear them everyday. They are easy to clean if you get them dirty and they fit great and are very comfertable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vans Old skool
customer_reviews.text: Vans are always a classic. Item arrived perfectly as described when described. Return policy included, which is always nice
customer_reviews.author: Johannes Streese

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy It ~
customer_reviews.text: I will buy more of this style. fits my wider foot too, so A1 product as always from Vans
customer_reviews.author: G. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my teenage son. He loves them - still wearing them after two years. The great part of Vans is that the size is consistent around the world.
customer_reviews.author: LCW

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter & she loved them, she said they were the most comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.author: De Anna

customer_reviews.title: Feels comfortable and Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this type of sneakers, feels comfortable and match with everything you wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Everything seems great about it
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Van's old skool Classic. Everything seems great about it. Decent foot grip and classy look!. Quality will be determine with time and use!. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amjid Noor

customer_reviews.title: love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: They feel comfortable and true to size. The black and white go with everything. I'll be buying this same pair again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C

customer_reviews.title: Easy shopping experience
customer_reviews.text: They were for my son for Christmas he love them
customer_reviews.author: Sithben

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for probably like 8 months and their still in pretty good condition and I wear them A LOT. Even as they start to get a little wear and tear they look just at good, it adds character to them. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: David Lupo

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: I can't answer all the questions because they were a birthday gift for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Vans...what more can you say!?
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son LOVES these shoes! You can't go wrong with Vans...fantastic quality and a great look!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M.

customer_reviews.title: VANS are solid!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes, they go with everything and always look great whether new or weathered.
customer_reviews.author: M. Petruccelli

customer_reviews.title: ... i was sort of nervous buying them but I'm glad i did
customer_reviews.text: cute shoes just what i expected i was sort of nervous buying them but I'm glad i did! actual vans haha
customer_reviews.author: Lory Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great old school vans, just as I remember as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Vans still look great.
customer_reviews.text: Son was thrilled to get them. He's put them through the wringer. Vans still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Thea D

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Super nice shoes and look great with almost every outfit. I only wear vans so I didn't think I'd have to break them in but I did, they hurt my feet at first.
customer_reviews.author: amazonvenusxo

customer_reviews.title: They’re so comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the build quility and looks. This will definitely be my everyday wear!!
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: A bit tight
customer_reviews.text: So this is the second pair of these I've bought. The first pair were in the same size I wear in many other shows, and felt too small, and after wearing them for about an hour my feet were fit to fall off. So I ordered the enxt half-size up, and apparently these too are also too tight. I give up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit perfect, and feel durable as well
customer_reviews.text: Shoes shipped on time, fit perfect, and feel durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex najera

customer_reviews.title: The quality of vans is good, but not like a few years ago
customer_reviews.text: The quality of vans is good, but not like a few years ago, the exterior of the shoes doesn't look like its gonna to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have always been. Big Vans fan. I never owned the classics but after buying them I love them. Really comfortable and are made much better than other company's shoes that are made to look like vans.
customer_reviews.author: zooyork773

customer_reviews.title: could be my feet
customer_reviews.text: but the shoes dig into my heel/achillies. Need to figure out a way to modify the shoe to prevent the chaffing.
customer_reviews.author: Yousef Algahtani

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes...he's got them in black and blue! Great price and quality. Shipping was a bit much but overall, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emmys Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and love the style
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and love the style. However the only con I have is that they are a little wide because of the unisex fit.
customer_reviews.author: A Hootie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. My daughter was very happy since we were unable to find them in our country. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It was still new and there was no damage or dirt on it.
customer_reviews.author: TAI N.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE VANS! they look so sick and skate well, though not very durable considering the canvas.but packaging was great and was delivered sooner then expected ordered it monday and got it thurday.Great service awesome shoe
customer_reviews.author: Cosmic Trees

customer_reviews.title: Good Old Vans
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing vans for 30+ years. Either my foot is shrinking, or Vans are growing. My last pair (and previous pairs) of Vans have been 10.5. This one and another I purchased in this size seem a little big. Very odd. Still not too bad, and enjoying my Vans!
customer_reviews.author: Tom P

customer_reviews.title: They are to big
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a size 7 1/2 not a size 8 but I understand things get mixed up but How can you fix my problem?
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good looking shoes but was missing an eyelet when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Real authentic Vans true to size. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Douglas

customer_reviews.title: To many emails asking for my feedback
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit fine as to be expected the only issue I had was the emails asking how were your shoes give us feed back. I believe I've gotten 8 emails. If I feel I want to give my feed back I'll do it I don't need a thousand emails asking me or even 8 emails
customer_reviews.author: Artie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad about them
customer_reviews.text: They were just what I asked for! Nothing bad about them. Highly recommend. It looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vans Women's Old Skool(tm) Core Classics
